fields.label: Paragraph
fields.options:
We acknowledge receipt of your Specimen Domestic Credit Insurance Policy and Quotation dated 29-Oct-2025

which was issued to us for consideration in connection with our application.

We herewith accept your Quotation and instruct you to proceed with the issue of the Policy as per the Quotation. Our payment for USD 0.00 to cover the Deposit Premium and Revenue Stamps is enclosed.

We certify :

(a) That we have not insured and will not insure elsewhere any part of the purchase price receivable under any contract of sale insured in terms of your Policy (the Uninsured Percentage).

(b) That we have not insured and will not insure elsewhere any amounts receivable in respect of contracts of sale which should be insured under your Policy (Whole Turnover).

(c) That we are not aware of any circumstances relating to any particular buyer or transaction which might adversely influence your acceptance of any risks submitted to you.

(d) That the representations made and facts stated by us in the Proposal Form are true and complete and that we agree that such representations and facts shall form the basis of and be incorporated in the Policy, and that the truth of such representations and facts shall be a condition precedent to any liability of Credit Insurance Zimbabwe Limited there under.

fields.label: Paragraph
fields.options:
Directors: S. Mhlanga (Chairman), L. Madavo (Managing), S.K. Chiganze, F. Kapanje, T. Mudangwe, E. Muvingi, B. Shumba

Credit Insurance Zimbabwe Limited
(Since 1965)
